verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> lovers of their own <S%G5367>selves<s%>, <S%G5366>covetous<s%>, <S%G213>boasters<s%>, <S%G5244>proud<s%>, <S%G989>blasphemers<s%>, <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents<s%>, <S%G884>unthankful<s%>, <S%G462>unholy<s%>,

Without natural <S%G794>affection<s%>, <S%G786>trucebreakers<s%>, false <S%G1228>accusers<s%>, <S%G193>incontinent<s%>, <S%G434>fierce<s%>, despisers of those that are <S%G865>good<s%>, false: or, one who foments strife

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> this <S%G5130>sort<s%> are <S%G1526>they<s%> which <S%G1744>creep<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> lead <S%G162>captive<s%> silly <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>laden<s%> with <S%G266>sins<s%>, led <S%G71>away<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>,

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5158>as<s%> <S%G2389>Jannes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2387>Jambres<s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G436>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G436>resist<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>: <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G2704>corrupt<s%> <S%G3563>minds<s%>, <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>. reprobate: or, of no judgment reprobate: or, of no judgment

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> hast fully <S%G3877>known<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>, manner of <S%G72>life<s%>, <S%G4286>purpose<s%>, <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>, <S%G26>charity<s%>, <S%G5281>patience<s%>, fully: or, been a diligent follower of

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hast been assured <S%G4104>of<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> thou hast <S%G3129>learned<s%> them;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> a <S%G1025>child<s%> thou hast <S%G1492>known<s%> the <S%G2413>holy<s%> <S%G1121>scriptures<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4679>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4679>wise<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> is given by inspiration of <S%G2315>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G5624>profitable<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1650>reproof<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1882>correction<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3809>instruction<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G739>perfect<s%>, throughly <S%G1822>furnished<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>. throughly: or, perfected
